          Notifies the VideoManager that the rat is (rearing/not rearing) in reality, so that the VideoManager can start learning the rat's size when (rearing/not rearing).

rearingNow

public void rearingNow(boolean rearing)
Notifies the VideoManager that the rat is (rearing/not rearing) in reality, so that the VideoManager can start learning the rat's size when (rearing/not rearing).

Parameters:
rearing - is the rat rearing now?
